snippet: The appeal to the religious right from Rick Santorum drove the Republican primary contest to new lows.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Rick Santorum's exit from the contest for the Republican nomination; asserts that Santorum's appeal to the religious right drove the primary contest to new lows.
lead_paragraph: The appeal to the religious right from Rick Santorum drove the Republican primary contest to new lows.

headline.seo: An End to a Divisive Presidential Campaign
headline.main: An End to a Divisive Campaign
headline.print_headline: An End to a Divisive Campaign
